summary: This is an email chain from March 2024 discussing a request for information about an individual's potential involvement with Jeffrey Epstein. A Special Victims Division officer is seeking information, and a colleague responds that they will check their files.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses whether an unnamed individual was involved with Jeffrey Epstein, who is the central figure in the case.

keyFacts: An email from March 2024 shows ongoing information requests related to Jeffrey Epstein.
A Special Victims Division officer is seeking information about a potential associate of Epstein.
The email suggests internal file checks are being conducted in response to the inquiry.
The correspondence indicates continued investigative or informational activity related to the Epstein case years after his death.
